fixes.name: Bull Steepener Normal Shock
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR days = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days]
RETURN
IF(
    days < 750, -5,
    IF(
        days > 10950, -1,
        -5 * (1 - (days - 750) / (10950 - 750)) + -1 * (days - 750) / (10950 - 750)
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau nested IF into DAX nested IF. Comments were removed. The calculated field [Risk Date # of Days] is referenced as a table-qualified column and stored in a VAR for clarity; the same linear interpolation expression is preserved for the else branch.
